email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer the vessel OCEAN HORIZON for your 12,000MT coal shipment from Newcastle to Yokohama on CIF terms.

Details:
- Vessel: OCEAN HORIZON
- DWT: 85,000
- LOA: 300m
- Laycan: 2023-11-01 to 2023-11-05
- Freight Quote: USD 25 per MT

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 22 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD 23 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 23 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the loading window and any potential delays?

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the loading window is 48 hours starting from 2023-11-01. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let us know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal from Newcastle to Yokohama
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Cargo Charterers
